sentences.sContent: Happy is the house that shelters a friend! It might well be built, like a festal bower or arch, to entertain him a single day.
sentences.sContent_eng: Happy is the house that shelters a friend! It might well be built, like a festal bower or arch, to entertain him a single day.
sentences.sCn: 快乐是朋友定居的房子！它将会被建造，像一个节日的凉亭或者护拱，是他每一个孤单的日子的港湾。

words.tran: 节日；庆祝，纪念活动；欢乐

trans.tranCn: 节日的, 欢乐的, 祭日的
